name: Audi Q8
description: The price of Audi Q8, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 1.07  - 1.43 Crore. It is available in 2 variants, with an engine of 2995 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Q8 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 8 airbags. Audi Q8 is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 9.8 kmpl for Q8.

variants.variant_name: Q8 Celebration 2995 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 9.8 kmpl, 335 bhp
Q8 55 TFSI quattro 2995 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 9.8 kmpl, 335 bhp
